tool_description: Generates comprehensive inventory status reports combining data from multiple sources for management dashboards and operational decision-making.

report_type.description: Type of report: summary, detailed, exception, or executive

report_scope.description: Scope identifiers: location IDs, SKU categories, or channel names

time_period.description: Reporting period: current, daily, weekly, monthly, or custom

custom_start_date.description: Start date for custom time period reports

custom_end_date.description: End date for custom time period reports

include_metrics.description: Metrics to include: stock_levels, turnover, alerts, reservations, discrepancies, valuations

format.description: Report format: json, csv, or summary_text

alert_threshold.description: Threshold for including items in exception reports

grouping.description: How to group report data: location, category, supplier, or sku

error_messages: Invalid report type: Use summary, detailed, exception, or executive.
Custom date range incomplete: Both custom_start_date and custom_end_date required for custom period.
Invalid time period: Use current, daily, weekly, monthly, or custom.
Unsupported metric: Valid metrics are stock_levels, turnover, alerts, reservations, discrepancies, valuations.
Invalid format: Use json, csv, or summary_text.
Invalid grouping option: Use location, category, supplier, or sku.
usage: Specify report_type, report_scope, and time_period for basic reports. Use custom dates for specific periods and select include_metrics for tailored reporting.

report_data.description: Main report data in requested format and grouping

summary_statistics.description: High-level summary of key inventory metrics

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations based on report findings
